verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1732>pass<s%>, when David and his <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> had made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> upon the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and upon <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, and had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>,
